mapper.select: select * from tbl_boards order by board_no

select r.* from(select rownum rn,a.* from (select * from tbl_boards b order by b.board_no) a
where rownum <=(#{page}*5)) r
where r.rn>(#{page}-1)*5
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_boards (BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER,IMG) values(boards_seq.nextval,#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{img})
mapper.update: update tbl_boards set view_cnt= view_cnt+1 where board_no=#{boardNo}
